meanings.meaning_en_US: The abstract science of number, quantity, and space.

examples.sentence: He studies [mathematics] at the university.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在大學學習數學

examples.sentence: The teacher explained [mathematics] in a simple way.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 老師用簡單的方式解釋數學

examples.sentence: Advanced [mathematics] can be challenging.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 高級數學可能很有挑戰性

meanings.meaning_en_US: Difficulty or problems that cause distress.

examples.sentence: She got into [trouble] with her parents.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她跟父母之間有了麻煩

examples.sentence: The project is facing many [troubles].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個項目面臨許多麻煩

examples.sentence: He was always in [trouble] for being late.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他總因遲到而惹麻煩

meanings.meaning_en_US: To prepare food by heating it.

examples.sentence: I love to [cook] Italian dishes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡烹飪義大利菜。

examples.sentence: Can you [cook] dinner for us tonight?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你今晚能為我們做晚餐嗎？

examples.sentence: He will [cook] a special meal for her birthday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他將為她的生日烹飪一頓特別的飯。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A shaped covering for the head, typically made of cloth or felt.

examples.sentence: He wore a red [hat] on his head.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他戴著一頂紅色的[帽子]。

examples.sentence: She bought a stylish [hat] from the store.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她從商店裡買了一頂時尚的[帽子]。

examples.sentence: The cowboy [hat] is very popular.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 牛仔[帽子]非常受歡迎。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A vehicle with two wheels that a person rides by pushing on foot pedals.

examples.sentence: He rides his [bike] to work every day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他每天騎著腳踏車上班。

examples.sentence: She bought a new [bike] for her birthday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為生日買了輛新腳踏車。

examples.sentence: We went for a ride on our [bikes] last weekend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們上個週末騎著腳踏車出去遊玩。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A flat dish used for serving or eating food.

examples.sentence: She placed the cake on the [plate] carefully.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她小心翼翼地把蛋糕放在盤子上。

examples.sentence: He washed the dirty [plate] after dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在晚餐後洗了髒盤子。

examples.sentence: The restaurant served food on beautiful china [plates].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家餐廳用漂亮的瓷盤上菜。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To be unable to find something or to fail to keep something.

examples.sentence: I always [lose] my keys when I'm in a hurry.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我在匆忙時總是會失去我的鑰匙。

examples.sentence: If we [lose] this game, we won't make the playoffs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果我們失去這場比賽，就無法進入季後賽。

examples.sentence: You shouldn't [lose] hope, things can get better.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你不應該失去希望，事情會變得更好。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A round plane figure whose boundary consists of points equidistant from the center.

examples.sentence: The children sat in a [circle] on the grass.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子們坐在草地上的圓圈裡。

examples.sentence: Draw a [circle] with a compass.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 用圓規畫一個圓圈。

examples.sentence: The wheels of the car are not perfect [circles].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 汽車的輪子並不完全是圓形。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The part of the human body extending from the shoulder to the wrist.

examples.sentence: She lifted her [arm] to wave.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她舉起手揮揮。

examples.sentence: He injured his [arm] during the game.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在比賽中傷了手臂。

examples.sentence: The baby reached out its little [arm] to grab the toy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 嬰兒伸出小手臂去抓玩具。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An extension or branch of something, often describing a division or part of an organization.

examples.sentence: The organization has an educational [arm].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該機構有個教育部門。

examples.sentence: The charity's fundraising [arm] raises significant amounts.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個慈善機構的籌款部門籌集了可觀的資金。

examples.sentence: Each [arm] of the business operates independently.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家公司的每個部門都獨立運作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A sweet, usually brown food made from roasted and ground cacao seeds.

examples.sentence: I love to eat [chocolate] when I feel down.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡在心情不好時吃巧克力。

examples.sentence: She makes delicious [chocolate] cakes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她做的巧克力蛋糕非常好吃。

examples.sentence: He prefers dark [chocolate] over milk [chocolate].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡黑巧克力而不是牛奶巧克力。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A married man; a man in relation to his spouse.

examples.sentence: Her [husband] is a great cook.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的丈夫是一位出色的廚師。

examples.sentence: My [husband] and I are going on vacation next month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我丈夫和我下個月要去度假。

examples.sentence: He is a dedicated [husband] and father.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是一位敬業的丈夫和父親。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Mentally deranged or extremely enthusiastic.

examples.sentence: She has some [crazy] ideas for the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對這個項目有一些瘋狂的想法。

examples.sentence: The movie was so [crazy] that I couldn't stop laughing.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這部電影如此瘋狂，我忍不住笑。

examples.sentence: He acts [crazy] when he gets too much caffeine.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當他攝取過多咖啡因時，他的行為變得很瘋狂。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The opening in the lower part of the face used for eating and speaking.

examples.sentence: He opened his [mouth] to speak.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他張開嘴巴說話

examples.sentence: She smiled and showed her [mouth].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她微笑並展示了她的嘴巴

examples.sentence: Close your [mouth] when you chew.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 咀嚼時要閉嘴

meanings.meaning_en_US: The entrance to a cave or another opening.

examples.sentence: The [mouth] of the cave is hidden.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 洞穴的入口隱藏起來了

examples.sentence: They found the [mouth] of the river.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們找到了河口

examples.sentence: Approaching the [mouth] of the glacier was dangerous.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 接近冰川的入口很危險

meanings.meaning_en_US: The mature ovary of a flowering plant, usually containing seeds.

examples.sentence: An apple is a type of [fruit].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 蘋果是一種水果

examples.sentence: He eats a lot of [fruit] for breakfast.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他早餐吃很多水果

examples.sentence: Tropical [fruit] can be very tasty.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 熱帶水果非常美味

meanings.meaning_en_US: To produce a picture or diagram by making lines and marks on paper.

examples.sentence: She loves to [draw] landscapes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡畫風景。

examples.sentence: He can [draw] very realistic portraits.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他能畫非常逼真的肖像。

examples.sentence: The child [draw] with crayons.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子用蠟筆畫畫。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To attract or pull towards oneself.

examples.sentence: The artist will [draw] people to the exhibition.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 藝術家將吸引人們參觀展覽。

examples.sentence: Her performance is sure to [draw] applause.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的表演肯定會吸引掌聲。

examples.sentence: The discount will [draw] more customers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 折扣將吸引更多客戶。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who designs, builds, or maintains engines, machines, or structures.

examples.sentence: She wants to become an [engineer] after studying physics.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她希望在學習物理後成為一名工程師。

examples.sentence: The [engineer] designed a new bridge.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那位工程師設計了一座新橋。

examples.sentence: Every [engineer] needs to understand basic mathematics.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位工程師都需要理解基本的數學。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A sweet crystalline substance obtained from various plants, especially sugar cane and sugar beet.

examples.sentence: She likes to add [sugar] to her tea.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡在茶裡加糖。

examples.sentence: Too much [sugar] can be harmful.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 過多的糖可能有害健康。

examples.sentence: He prefers brown [sugar] over white.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他更喜歡紅糖而不是白糖。
